roleset.name: make peaceful
roleset.note: PACIFY-V NOTES: A 'donnybrook' is a brawl or brawler, named after the Irish town of Donnybrook which is apparently populated entirely by hotheads. (from pacify.01-v)

example.name: passified?
example.text: The manuevering illustrates [an emerging Republican donnybrook]-1, pacified [*]-1 since the early 1980s.
